====Usage notes====
Placed after the main text of a letter, with {{lang|zh|此致}} and {{lang|zh|敬禮}} written on two lines:
<pre>
此致
敬禮！
</pre>

The exclamation mark after {{lang|zh|敬禮}} is optional.

[[zh:此致敬禮]]
